games.title: Stickman Clicker
games.description: Stickman Clicker is a clicker game where you help a stickman become a billionaire. Tap to earn money, invest in upgrades, and unlock stylish accessories. Customize your stickman and achieve milestones by unlocking various achievements. How wealthy can you get?
games.howToPlayText: Click the stickman to earn money, buy upgrades, unlock achievements, and grow your idle empire fast!

games.title: Idle Cinema Tycoon
games.description: Idle Cinema Tycoon is a casual business simulation game where you are in charge of your very own movie theater with the aim of slowly managing an empire of theaters. Purchase cinema halls, schedule screenings, and upgrade interiors to boost profits. Curate and collect films of various genres, liaise with guests in VIP rooms, and squeeze out as much profit as you can from ticket sales and more. Strategically expand your theater and complete missions to unlock valuable rewards!
games.howToPlayText: Navigate your cinema empire using the left mouse button to interact with the game's user interface. This control allows you to manage theater operations, make upgrades, and execute strategic decisions effortlessly

games.title: Kinder Garden
games.description: Dive into the charming realm of Kinder Garden, where you care for a daycare. Participate in fun tasks like feeding and changing diapers to keep the little ones happy. Unlock new spaces and toys as you play for free on your phone or computer, enjoying the satisfaction of each achievement.

games.title: Idle Pong
games.description: Idle Pong is a fun and satisfying idle clicker game where every tap launches a high-speed pong ball to smash through colorful obstacles! Watch the chaos unfold as your pong bounces, breaks, and earns you XP even while you're idle.
games.howToPlayText:
Click or tap to buy and spawn pong balls

Click and drag on the UI to scroll up and down

Upgrade your power, unlock unique pong balls with exciting effects, and push through challenging stages as you chase the next big combo. Whether you're actively tapping or just watching the pongs go wild, there's always something satisfying to see.

games.title: Tap Hunters
games.description:
Clicker game with colorful and bright graphic.  
Tap to hunt monsters, build your team of heroes and upgrade them. Collect and power up with collection of weapons.  
Travel to new worlds to earn rewards, and grow stronger as you play. With each run you will able to reach higher levels.
games.howToPlayText:
- Tap or click with mouse on monsters to defeat them  
- Collect coins, by tapping on them or hovering them with mouse. Coins also collect automatically after few seconds.
- Spend coins for upgrades, hire new heroes and their upgrades
- Reach zone 50 to unlock portal to new world. Starting new world will rewards you with gems and souls. You can spend them for new upgrades, auto clicks and heroes upgrade and weapons.
- Reach higher game zones to get better rewards in new worlds.

games.title: Money Maker
games.description: Money Maker is a merge game about running a banknote machine. Drop money, place power-up chips in the right spots, and let every bounce boost your income. Unlock upgrades and new chip slots to multiply profits and keep the cash flowing. How far can you scale your money machine?
games.howToPlayText:
How to play Money Maker
- drag pins onto the board to increase profits.
- drag one pin onto another to merge them into a higher-tier pin.
- upgrade the Money Machine to raise the base banknote value and your earnings.

games.title: Millionaire Factory
games.description:
Millionaire Factory üî©üè≠ is a fun and addictive üéâ clicker game where players collect Metal to grow their fortune. By tapping the giant Metal button üëÜ, players gather Metals, convert them into Money üí∞, and invest in upgrades to build their own factory empire.

The game offers a growth journey that starts with a small piece of Metal üî© and expands into a massive factory and investment fortune üìàüìâ.
games.howToPlayText:
Metal Production üî©:
At the heart of the game lies a massive Metal (Gear) button. Each tap üëÜ earns you Metal, which serves as your primary source of income.

Metals ‚Üí Money üíµ:
You can convert collected Metals into Money üí∏ to keep your economy running. For example:
‚û°Ô∏è 1 Metal = 0.1 Money
‚û°Ô∏è 10 Metals = 1 Money

Income and Robot Program Upgrades ü§ñüè≠:
With the money you earn üíµ, you can:

Purchase upgrades that increase the amount of Metal gained per tap üí™.

Invest in automation systems such as the Basic Auto Robot 3Ô∏èüî®, Regional Robot Program ‚öíÔ∏è, and National Automatic Robot Fleet.
These systems generate passive income every 5 seconds.

Factories üè≠:
At the start of the game, you begin with a single factory, which you can upgrade üîß. You can also purchase up to three additional factories üè≠, each of which can be further developed.
Every factory has a progress bar üìä representing its Metal production. Once the bar fills, the factory automatically sells the produced Metal, adds the profit üíµ to your balance, and the cycle restarts.

Fast Investments‚ö°:
üìä In the investment section, carefully observe the **candlestick movements** left by the dynamic system.
‚è±Ô∏è Within about **15 seconds**, predict whether the price will go **up or down.**
üí∞ Then, open a **trade** in the direction you believe it will move, using your chosen amount.
üéØ If your prediction is correct, you‚Äôll earn **double** the amount you invested! üíéüöÄ


Achievements üèÖ:
There are 6 unique achievements üåü to unlock throughout the game, based on the total Metals collected üî©, upgrades purchased üîù, and wealth accumulated üí∞.

games.title: Money Ping Pong
games.description: Join the exciting journey of Money Ping Pong, an engaging idle game where you manage money blocks to influence bouncing balls and boost profits. Explore diverse maps, unlock new blocks, and enjoy a mix of strategy and chill gameplay on your device as you create your virtual wealth!
games.howToPlayText: Money ping pong - casual logical arcade game for all ages, where players place blocks on the game board to earn in-game currency and progress through levels. Use skills to grow progress faster

games.title: Click Click Clicker
games.description: Click Click Clicker defines the idle clicker genre, offering engaging gameplay where players accumulate wealth by clicking a button. As you advance, you can unlock different buttons, cursors, themes, and music. This free game is available on mobile devices and computers, providing fun for all.
games.howToPlayText:
Click Click Clicker is as true to the clicker genre as it gets. You‚Äôre clicking a button to click another button. Click the button, upgrade your abilities, and get shiny new buttons for your hard work.

Like many clicker games, you start with one humble click. With each click, you generate cash to buy upgrades. Those upgrades include an increase in your passive ability to earn money, the amount of cash you earn per click, or the number of cursors you have.

Click Click Clicker is all about getting shiny new things with minimal effort. You can customize everything in this game: backgrounds, music, cursor, and buttons. But you have to put in the work to unlock them first! Keep clicking or coast along on your idle earnings until you get there.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/click-click-clicker-playgama?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Airplane Factory - Tycoon
games.description: Build and expand your own aviation empire in Airplane Factory - Tycoon ! Start small by producing lightweight planes, and gradually scale up to manufacturing giant airliners and advanced fighter jets. Manage production lines, upgrade your factory facilities, enhance your manager‚Äôs skills, and unlock new types of aircraft to boost your profits. Strategically grow your business to become the ultimate aircraft manufacturer!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls on Desktop:    
- WASD  or Left Mouse Click (LMB) : Move your character around the map.

Controls on Mobile Devices:    
- Swipe : Simply swipe across the screen to move your character in any direction.

games.title: Jurassic Digging - Tycoon
games.description: The goal of the game is to uncover ancient remains, clean them from dirt, and assemble complete skeletons. Progress through all levels and provide museums with an extensive collection of dinosaur skeletons.
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
On Mobile:  Tap and swipe to interact.  
On Desktop:  For movement use WASD or Left Mouse Click.

Additional Features:
- Explore various dig sites to find rare fossils.  
- Restore and polish bones to increase their value.  
- Design museum exhibits to attract more visitors.  
- Expand your museum and unlock new tools as you advance.

games.title: Money Factory - Earn a Billion
games.description: Money Factory - Earn a Billion is an engaging online strategy and puzzle game where you manage a money-making factory. Strategically enhance your operations, overcome challenges, and unlock new levels while boosting your earnings. Play on any device and enjoy a thrilling experience as you build wealth and demonstrate your skills.
games.howToPlayText:
1. Making money is easy at first, but you'll need creativity and luck to keep growing your factory.
2. Buy boosters, fill the field, and multiply your earnings.
3. Hold your finger or mouse button to move boosters, release to place or combine two identical ones.
4. Aim to become a billionaire!

games.title: Idle Pop Merge
games.description:
üéÆ MERGE, TAP, CONQUER! üéÆ
Welcome to the ultimate cartoon merge adventure! Start with one tiny fighter and build an unstoppable team of 32 unique toon warriors!

üåü SIMPLE YET ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY
Merge identical fighters to unlock powerful new characters
Tap to boost attack speed and demolish enemies faster
Strategic placement on your 3x3 battle grid matters!

‚öîÔ∏è EPIC ARENA BATTLES
Conquer 120 challenging enemies across multiple arenas
Face single, double, and triple arena challenges
Each victory brings you closer to unlocking new fighters!
games.howToPlayText: Drag and drop the characters into the available slots to combine and merge them into powerful new forms!

games.title: Weaponsmith Evolution - Weapon Merge
games.description: Dive into the captivating universe of Weaponsmith Evolution - Weapon Merge, starting with simple daggers and advancing to legendary weapon crafting. This free online game tests your skills against tough foes as you upgrade weapons, ensuring the safety of the realm, whether you play on a phone or computer.
games.howToPlayText:
- Start with basic weapons and drag identical ones to merge them into more powerful versions.
- Each new weapon brings more gold.
- Spend gold on upgrades: unlock new types of weapons or speed up the merging process.
- Fight monsters and progress through levels.
- From time to time, you‚Äôll encounter powerful bosses. Defeat them to prove your mastery!
- Experiment with upgrades to increase weapon efficiency and earn more.
- Keep playing to unlock legendary weapons and become a true master of the arsenal.

games.title: Gangsta Island: Crime City
games.description: Dive into the exciting realm of Crime City, where you start as a regular citizen and rise to power as a crime leader. Conquer neighborhoods, battle rival gangs, and pull off daring heists with engaging mini-games, all available for both mobile and desktop play.
games.howToPlayText: Gangsta Island: Crime City is a game where you start as a street dweller and climb your way to world domination. Use street-smart skills, engage in petty thefts, confront rival crews, and venture into high-stakes heists in Las Vegas. Experience captivating mini-games and activities as you strive to become the ultimate underworld boss.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/gangster-island-crime-city?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Idle Train Empire Tycoon
games.description: Dive into the engaging world of Idle Train Empire Tycoon, where you can create and oversee your railway station. Upgrade trains, design routes, and accommodate more guests to expand your empire. Enjoy countless challenges and rewards in this exciting free online game, available on mobile and PC.
games.howToPlayText:
Develop your railway station by purchasing and upgrading trains, as well as customizing routes! Acquire and furnish various spaces and waiting halls! Unlock access to all railway platforms and destinations! Increase visitor traffic and enhance profits with every ticket sold!

The primary genre of the game is Idle Tycoon. For an extended period, you'll be involved in managing your own business - a railway station. Earn profits from serving visitors and invest them back into your business. Complete daily and regular tasks, receive valuable rewards, and expand your train collection! As your station progresses, new railway platforms, destinations, and trains will become accessible! Wisely configure routes and maximize profits from each visitor! Allocate technology points to various station and train improvements! All of this will assist you in developing a large and profitable business!


Controls:
Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI
Plus and minus keys = change the size of the camera



‚Ä¢ IGB by Playgama

games.title: Monster Slayer. Idle Clicker
games.description: Monster Slayer is an action-packed game where you battle quirky monsters and gather valuable resources. Strengthen your hero by unlocking powerful skills and spells, capture monster souls to expand your collection, and trade Flame Shards for rare relics. Enhance your abilities with Inlay Stones and potions as you take on ever-stronger foes in your quest for victory!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
Use the left mouse button to interact with objects and UI elements.

games.title: Mystery Digger
games.description: Join the exciting journey of **Mystery Digger**, an addictive idle clicker game. Explore underground for treasures and stories. Upgrade your drill with each click to uncover fascinating finds. Enjoy this calming game on any device and satisfy your curiosity with every discovery.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard: Control is carried out by pressing buttons on the screen. 
Mobile: Control is carried out by pressing buttons on the screen.

games.title: Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon
games.description: Embark on a journey to build your own empire in Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon, an engaging online economic simulator that combines elements of resource crafting, empire development, and clicker gameplay. As the ruler of a thriving island, your mission is to explore every corner, uncover precious resources, and craft them into valuable goods. By hiring managers and traders, you can automate tasks and maximize profits, ensuring your empire's success both on the phone and on the computer. Upgrade your factories, fulfill production orders, and let your empire shine in this captivating free game.
games.howToPlayText:
Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon is an economic simulator, time-killer, combining elements of empire development, resource crafting, and clicker gameplay. You play as a ruler tasked to explore the island, sending expeditions to discover new resources and crafting them. Hire managers and traders to handle the daily tasks and bring additional profits to your empire. Upgrade factories with resources and maintain a balance of production for finished goods. Fulfill production orders and earn valuable rewards.

Explore the island and uncover all the resources needed to make your empire so great that everyone in this fantastic world will know about it!



‚Ä¢ Go through the introductory training, which will explain how the production of goods works, how new regions of the island are opened, and how the process of exploring and discovering new resources works.
‚Ä¢ To earn money, produce resources at factories. After production is completed, the finished product can be sold. Improve factories, produce more goods, and earn more profit.
‚Ä¢ You need to equip and send expeditions (invest the necessary resources and goods) to open up new regions of the island.
‚Ä¢ To discover new resources, go to the research center and purchase the explored resources.
‚Ä¢ To obtain additional profit or automate some actions (such as selling finished products), hire managers and traders
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/idle-crafting-empire-tycoon-3a99-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: RPG Idle Clicker
games.description: RPG Idle Clicker is an incremental game where you embark on an adventure to slay monsters. Click to deal damage, earn gold, and unlock powerful swords to enhance your attacks. Upgrade your blades and recruit auto-attacking heroes who battle monsters every second, even while you are offline. With stunning WebGL visuals, face tougher enemies and epic bosses in this browser-based game. Whether you prefer active gameplay or idle progression, RPG Idle Clicker offers endless growth. Get ready and become the ultimate monster hunter!
games.howToPlayText: Tap the enemy to deal damage and eliminate them. Interact with the UI buttons to upgrade sword levels, heroes, equip items, and much more.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/rpg-idle-clicker?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Sigma Boy: Musical Clicker
games.description: Join Sigma Boy in a beat-driven journey through diverse landscapes from deserts to space in this free online clicker game. Each tap earns points for upgrades, enhancing his skills as you tackle various challenges across devices. Embrace the rhythm and guide Sigma Boy to success!
games.howToPlayText: To get started with Fennec The Fox: Clicker Adventure, simply tap on Fennec the Fox to earn points. Use these points to purchase upgrades that boost Fennec‚Äôs abilities. As Fennec evolves, he will move from the desert to new, more advanced environments, eventually embarking on a cosmic journey. Each level presents unique challenges, so keep clicking, upgrading, and evolving to help Fennec conquer them all.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/sigma-boy-musical-clicker?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Idle Supermarket Tycoon
games.description: Enter the vibrant realm of Idle Supermarket Tycoon, where you build and oversee a successful mall. This free game encourages you to grow by adding stores, improving designs, and satisfying customers. Make smart investments and manage deliveries to increase your earnings, with plenty of missions and rewards to enjoy.
games.howToPlayText:
You have a Shopping mall at your disposal, which you need to develop by acquiring new shops and outfitting them, as well as improving the exterior and interior of the entire Shopping mall.

Serve customers, earn money and reputation. Invest your profits into your Shopping mall, and distribute reputation points among visitors. Assign priority customers to each shop in your mall. This way, you can maximize profits from serving them!

Purchase delivery vehicles to earn additional income from each completed trip. Don't forget to monitor the corridors, as trash cans or vending machines might get clogged.

If you're unsure what to do next, you can always refer to the missions. Complete them to earn valuable rewards and expand your Shopping mall, your grand Supermarket!



Controls:
Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI
Plus and minus keys = change the size of the camera

games.title: Build levels ‚Äì earn money!
games.description: Get ready for an addictive challenge! Tap the screen to release balls and aim for the holes in each round. After every round, hit the store to grab powerful upgrades and cool items to boost your progress. Complete levels, collect diamonds, and unlock permanent upgrades to level up faster. How far can you push your skills? The further you go, the bigger the rewards!
games.howToPlayText:
1. Tap anywhere on the screen to release balls into the holes at the start of each round
2. After each round, visit the store to buy upgrades or items for the next level.
3. Complete levels to earn diamonds, which can be used for permanent upgrades.
4. Keep leveling up and maximize your skills!

games.title: Idle Tower Defense
games.description: Build your ultimate idle tower defense! Merge strategy, upgrades, and epic battles in this thrilling idle defense game. Protect your tower from endless waves of enemies in the best incremental game experience online!
games.howToPlayText:
Idle Tower Defense - Protect your tower from endless waves of enemies! 

Progression System:
‚Ä¢ During combat: Collect "meat" to activate temporary battle upgrades
‚Ä¢ Between battles: Spend coins on permanent improvements and unlock new features 

Controls:
‚Ä¢ Left Mouse Button or Touch

games.title: Steve Evolution Mega Clicker
games.description: Experience an exhilarating adventure with Steve Evolution Mega Clicker, a captivating game filled with excitement. Upgrade your skills, earn coins, and discover unique abilities with every click, all while enjoying stunning visuals. Play on any device for endless entertainment and an engaging clicking experience!
games.howToPlayText:
üí∞ Click on the screen to earn coins.
üìà Use coins to upgrade Steve, allowing him to earn more and evolve faster.
üöÄ Unlock new evolution levels and improve Steve‚Äôs abilities.
üåü Catch bonuses and rare power-ups that appear randomly to speed up your progress!
üìä Compete with other players to climb the ranks.

It‚Äôs simple: click, upgrade, and evolve to become the richest in "Steve Evolution Mega Clicker"!

games.title: Click & Idle - Slimes!
games.description: Step into the delightful universe of Click & Idle - Slimes! Tap the squishy slime to generate income and expand your empire. Unlock and enhance various skills, each offering unique perks that go beyond simple click boosts. Some grant instant rewards, while others provide long-term advantages, allowing you to shape your own progression. Collect charming slimes, customize your background, and embark on an endless adventure to become the ultimate slime master!
games.howToPlayText: Taking control is easy! On PC, click with your mouse to interact and navigate menus. On mobile, simply tap and swipe to engage with the slime, unlock upgrades, and explore different options.

games.title: Cup Quest
games.description:
Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey: A Feline Hero‚Äôs Adventure Begins!

Join a brave cat on an epic quest in Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey, a fresh twist on the classic balls-and-cups game. This isn't just about tossing balls into cups‚Äîit's a full-blown adventure packed with clever puzzles, physics-based challenges, and one courageous kitty determined to save the day.

Your Cat, the Hero
Meet your furry champion‚Äîa quick-thinking, nimble cat with a heart of gold. As danger looms and traps lie in wait, it‚Äôs up to this whiskered warrior to take on wild levels filled with spinning platforms, explosives, and tricky obstacles.

Precision Meets Puzzle
Each level is a test of aim and timing. Launch the ball just right, bounce it off the environment, and land it perfectly in the cup. It‚Äôs not just about power‚Äîsuccess requires strategy, finesse, and a little creative thinking.
 What Awaits You
- Over 200 unique levels, ranging from simple to seriously tricky
- Skill-based gameplay that mixes timing, puzzle-solving, and action
- Hero upgrades: unlock new feline champions and grow stronger as you progress
- Satisfying animations and smooth physics that make every throw feel great
- Enemies and traps: it's not just puzzles‚Äîyou‚Äôll have to outsmart swarm enemies too

Become a Cup Champion
Explore a magical world where every level brings new challenges. Battle your way through enemy swarms, master the art of the perfect shot, and rise as the legendary hero of the cup realm.

Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey isn‚Äôt just a puzzle game‚Äîit‚Äôs a heartwarming, skill-testing adventure that‚Äôll keep you coming back for more. Grab your paws, line up your shot, and get ready to become a legend.
games.howToPlayText: Use the mouse to guide the balls dropping from the cup, and mouse is also used for interacting with UI elements (buttons, powerups, etc.)

games.title: Click Kitty Idle
games.description:
Click Kitty Idle‚Äì Fast-Paced Cat Clicker Challenge!
Click Kitty Idle is a fun and competitive idle clicker game where speed, timing, and strategy matter! Tap to feed your kitty, level up, and dominate the leaderboard in this addictively cute cat-clicking game!                                             
Why You‚Äôll Love It:
If you enjoy fast-paced clicker games with a twist, It‚Äôs not just about clicking‚Äîit's about clicking smart and fast.
Play now and prove you‚Äôve got the fastest¬†paws¬†in¬†town!

‚Ä¢Cute & competitive gameplay with pressure-based challenges!
‚Ä¢Buy fun food like tuna, milk, cheese & more!
‚Ä¢Unlock cute cat characters like Miss Pawlina and Captain Purrbeard!
‚Ä¢Boosters: Auto Click, Time Extension, and Massive Click Power!
‚Ä¢Compete for high scores and unlock achievements!
games.howToPlayText:
Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI

How to Play:
‚Ä¢You have 32 seconds to earn coins by clicking.
‚Ä¢Use coins to buy cat food before time runs out!
‚Ä¢Each time you buy food, the price increases (ex: 100 ‚Üí 860 ‚Üí more!)
‚Ä¢Upgrade your Click Value to +1, +2... and increase your speed!
